pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mixed FLP and ML Estimation of ETAS Space-Time Point Processes for Earthquake Description // Estimation of the components of an ETAS (Epidemic Type Aftershock Sequence) model for earthquake description. Non-parametric background seismicity can be estimated through FLP (Forward Likelihood Predictive). New version 2.0.0: covariates have been introduced to explain the effects of external factors on the induced seismicity; the parametrization has been changed; Chiodi, Adelfio (2017)doi:10.18637/jss.v076.i03.
